title: Brief lag when logging in
body:
Good morning,

When I log in after typing my password, there is a lag in 'Home' page in game client. Computer just freezes for a brief time and runs again. Also game client's homepage is completely black (no pictures showing) but only titles like The 2015 LCS Season etc.

It could be due to internet or computer problem, however both of them are fine and are optimized for the game.

I believe this happened from few days ago when I started playing LoL again in few months.

Can someone from Riot help out on this issue please {{champion:17}} ?.

Thank you
Kind regards
Fish and Chips

replies.body: Reset your Internet Explorer settings to default and then set its security level to "Medium". Tell me what happens then if you try to log into League.
